fieldVolumeDescription1: If you wish, you can connect Swift, S3 containers, and private/public Git repositories to your job, which we recommend configuring beforehand via the AI Dashboard.
fieldVolumeDescription2: Once they are attached, they will be temporarily loaded and cached near your instance, to minimise latency and improve performance. A best practice is to attach one container with your incoming data, and another with your outgoing data.
containerTitle: S3 container, private Git repositories, and OVHcloud Object Storage
datastoreDescription: S3, private Git repositories, and OVHcloud Object Storage (Swift)
containerFieldHelper: Volume container It can be created on demand if it’s not already in the Datastore
permissionDescription: In ‘Read Only’ mode, no sync is launched at the end of execution. This speeds up job completion.
cachingDescription: Cached containers can be reused by other AI products without additional syncing. Containers are removed from the cache after a period of inactivity.
